meanings.definition: Being the most recent or the latest in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: My youngest sister just got a new toy.
meanings.sent2: She is the youngest student in her class.
meanings.sent3: The youngest puppy in the litter kept stealing socks for fun.
meanings.sent4: The youngest member of the team brought fresh ideas to the project.
meanings.sent5: The youngest tree in the forest stood tall and vibrant.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the most recent or the latest in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The youngest version of the software has improved features.
meanings.sent2: This is the youngest model of the car available.
meanings.sent3: The youngest episode of the show had unexpected plot twists.
meanings.sent4: The youngest edition of the book included bonus content.
meanings.sent5: The youngest painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention.
